layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x584
layer at (8,300) size 784x18
  LayoutBlockFlow (relative positioned) {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18
    LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 407x18
      text run at (0,0) width 407: "This test passes if the text is rendered in the middle of the page."
